These are also some of the most challenging and difficult ones to make. Cracking the code on how to build a well-crafted and engaging video game requires practice, ingenuity, skill, and patience. But not every developer is up to the task. Some simply fail at creating an entertaining experience for players. This list compiles some of the disappointments from 2018 that failed to meet an acceptable standard of quality.
These are the worst games of 2018, broken down by category and listed in no particular order. Some might have had good intentions or interesting concepts, but fell short in their execution. The new dialogue system, which allows players to choose between multiple options to advance the plot, is particularly bad. There are loads of bugs, and the system is prone to creating strange situations where you can\u2019t proceed further with the game. For example, at one point, I couldn\u2019t progress because someone thought I was in love with them, but I couldn\u2019t figure out how to tell them otherwise. The game is also very buggy and crash-prone, and its visuals are below average."),mdx("h2",null),mdx("h2",null),mdx("h2",null,"Fighting Games"),mdx("p",null,"Street Fighter V: Arcade Edition \u2013 The latest installment in Capcom\u2019s legendary fighting game series.
